mapper.select: SELECT PT.ID, PT.PRODUCT_NAME, PT.PRODUCT_PRICE, PT.STATUS, PT.DESCRIPT , ATT.SAVE_NAME, ATT.FILE_PATH FROM PRODUCT_TB PT LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT_TB ATT ON PT.ID = ATT.FK_ID AND ATT.FILE_TYPE = 'product' WHERE 1=1 OR PT.STATUS = 'ON'
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT_TB SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{product_price}, STATUS = #{status} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_TB (ID,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_PRICE,DESCRIPT,STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_TB_ID.nextval,#{product_name},#{product_price},#{descript},#{status})
SELECT SEQ_PRODUCT_TB_ID.currval FROM dual

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_TB (ID, FK_ID, FILE_TYPE, SAVE_NAME, REAL_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, REGDATE, THUMBNAIL_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_ATTACHMENT_ID.nextval, #{fk_id}, #{file_type}, #{save_name},#{real_name},#{file_path},#{file_size},#{file_ext},sysdate, #{thumbnail_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT_TB WHERE FK_ID = #{id} AND FILE_TYPE = #{type}
